Description: 1983 Peavey T-15 -Natural Wood – Made In the USA Overall this 36-year-old guitar is in great condition withno major defects (see pictures for details). The guitar was dissembled, cleaned, polished, and buffed. The guitar received a complete setup and newstrings. Here is what thePeavey T-15 Operating Guide states: The T-15 is a high quality musical instrument constructedfrom the finest materials and with the most up-to date production methodsavailable. With reasonable care, itshould provide many, many years of service and outstanding performance. The T-15 body is made from the finest hand selected hardwoodand is relatively compact in keeping with the slightly shorter scale length. Adouble cutaway design with special forearm and rib-cage relief contouring,rests comfortably and with good balance against the player’s body. The select rock maple neck is of a unique bi-laminatedconstruction to provide unmatched rigidity and freedom from warpage. Additionalreinforcement is provided with a steel torsion rod. This neck adjustment rod features rolled threadsfor improved strength and freedom from breakage. Additionalinformation and features:Body: Hand selectedhardwoodNeck: Rock Maple bi-laminated constructionPickups: Two single coilhigh performance and full range operationCircuitry: Conventional with atone-compensating volume controlBridge: Massive die-cast alloyHardware: Topquality tuning machines, die-cast top nut, massive control knobs, sturdy pickupselector switch, 1 Master volume and Tone control, and 3-way selectorswitch.
Title: 1983 Peavey T-15 - Natural Wood – Made In the USA - Nice!
